trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its application directory.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en samling tilhører en kodegruppe ved å teste programkatalogen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The membership condition tests whether the assembly URL evidence is a path within the directory specified by <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>.
trans-unit.target: Medlemskapsvilkåret tester om samlingen URL-adressen bevis er en bane i katalogen som angis av <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the membership condition is satisfied by the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om medlemskapsbetingelse er oppfylt av den angitte bevis.

trans-unit.source: The `evidence` parameter must contain both <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> evidence that specifies the application directory of the running application and <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence that specifies the code base of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Den `evidence` parameteren må inneholde både <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>bevis som angir programkatalogen kjører programmet og <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>bevis som angir kodebasen for samlingen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>

trans-unit.source: The code base specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence must represent a path in the directory tree of the application directory specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> evidence for this method to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kodebasen som angitt av den <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>bevis må representere en sti i katalogtreet over programmappen angitt av den <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>bevis for denne metoden til å returnere `true`.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: Bevis angitt som foreta testen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte bevis oppfyller medlemskapsvilkår; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tilsvarende kopi av Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: En ny, identiske kopi av det gjeldende Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified membership condition is an <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte Medlemskapsvilkåret er en <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å sammenligne <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified membership condition is an <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte Medlemskapsvilkåret er en <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The e parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is not a valid application directory membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: Den e parameteren er ikke en gyldig mappe medlemskap betingelse element.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The policy level context, used to resolve named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: Policyen nivå konteksten, brukes til å løse navngitt tillatelse Sett referanser.

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The e parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is not a valid application directory membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: Den e parameteren er ikke en gyldig mappe medlemskap betingelse element.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Henter hash-koden for gjeldende medlemskapsvilkår.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Hashkoden for gjeldende medlemskapsvilkår.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en strengrepresentasjon av Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the state of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: En strengrepresentasjon av tilstanden til Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden med angitt <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The policy level context for resolving named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: Policyen nivå konteksten for å løse navngitt tillatelse angi referanser.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.
